titles.title: Research, Hazard Intervention, and National Outreach for Healthier Homes Act of 2008
A bill to improve research on health hazards in housing, to enhance the capacity of programs to reduce such hazards, to require outreach, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10074-10075)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
